name: @rdfjs/normalize
description: RDF graph normalization for RDF/JS datasets

scripts.fetch-test-suite: if [ ! -e test/support/suite ]; then git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/json-ld/normalization.git test/support/suite; fi
scripts.test: stricter-standard index.js test/test.js test/support/*.js && npm run fetch-test-suite && mocha --delay

author: Thomas Bergwinkl <bergi@axolotlfarm.org> (https://www.bergnet.org/people/bergi/card#me)
